name: Adventures with Spok
description:
My first game.  Learned a lot.  Can't wait to make another. 

Play as Spok and escape 7 unique levels as quickly as possible.

Lot's of fun Star Trek references in here. 

I used the creation of this game to reinforce concepts taught at university.  Staying sharp in java over the summer while having fun haha.  Enjoy.  

P.S. I've beaten the game in 323 seconds...
